sentences.en: a movie that is sure to bridge the generation gap
sentences.cn: 肯定能弥合代沟的一部电影

sentences.en: A new generation of scientists became fascinated by dinosaurs.
sentences.cn: 新一代科学家对恐龙研究着了迷。

sentences.en: He is arguably the best actor of his generation.
sentences.cn: 按理他是他那一代中最优秀的演员。

sentences.en: He launched a bitter diatribe against the younger generation.
sentences.cn: 他对年轻一代发起了猛烈的抨击。

sentences.en: He was the greatest batsman of his generation.
sentences.cn: 他是他们那一代最出色的击球手。

sentences.en: Higher living standards separate the older generation from their children.
sentences.cn: 高的生活标准把老一代人同他们的儿辈区别开来.

sentences.en: In my generation the divorce rate is very high.
sentences.cn: 我们这一代人离婚率很高。

sentences.en: Like most of my generation, I had never known a war.
sentences.cn: 和我们这一代的大多数人一样，我并没有经历过战争。

sentences.en: Manufacturers are working on a new generation of cheaper digital radios.
sentences.cn: 制造商正在研制价格更便宜的新一代数字收音机。

sentences.en: She dazzled London society as the most beautiful debutante of her generation.
sentences.cn: 她首次出现在伦敦社交界便艳惊四座，被视为同龄人里最美丽的年轻女子。

sentences.en: The biology class studied the generation of fruit flies.
sentences.cn: 生物班的学生研究了果蝇的繁殖.

sentences.en: the generation of electricity
sentences.cn: 发电

sentences.en: the mindset of the computer generation
sentences.cn: 计算机时代的思维倾向

sentences.en: the need to preserve the planet for future generations
sentences.cn: 为子孙后代保护地球的必要性

sentences.en: The power-generation plant belched out five tonnes of ash an hour.
sentences.cn: 发电站每小时排出5吨灰。

sentences.en: The story has been handed down from generation to generation.
sentences.cn: 这个故事是一代一代传下来的。

sentences.en: These personality traits get passed on from generation to generation.
sentences.cn: 这些性格特征代代相传。

sentences.en: They are a lost generation in search of an identity.
sentences.cn: 他们属于迷惘的一代，想要找寻自我。

sentences.en: They belong to an older, more self-denying generation.
sentences.cn: 他们属于更加克己的上一代人。

sentences.en: This book was handed down from generation to generation.
sentences.cn: 这本书世代相传.

words.tran_cn: 生殖的；生产的；有生殖力的；有生产力的
一代；产生；一代人；[生物]生殖

phrases.tran_cn: 煤气化；气体的产生；气体发生
n. 代沟（两代人之间的隔阂）
发电，发电量；发电机设备
倍频效应；二次谐波发生

trans.tran_en: all people of about the same age
